mapper.update: UPDATE tb_resource SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, application_name = #{applicationName}, type = #{type}, source = #{source}, version = #{version}, value = #{value}, authority = #{authority}, icon = #{icon}, parent_id = #{parentId}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, creation_time = #{creationTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_resource ( name, code, application_name, type, source, version, value, authority, icon, parent_id, status, sort, creation_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{applicationName}, #{type}, #{source}, #{version}, #{value}, #{authority}, #{icon}, #{parentId}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{creationTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.id, r.name, r.code, r.application_name, r.type, r.version, r.value, r.authority, r.icon, r.parent_id, r.status, r.sort, r.creation_time, r.source, r.remark FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_group_resource gr ON gr.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON gr.group_id = g.id WHERE g.id = #{groupId}

SELECT DISTINCT r.id, r.name, r.code, r.application_name, r.type, r.version, r.value, r.authority, r.icon, r.parent_id, r.status, r.sort, r.creation_time, r.source, r.remark FROM tb_resource r LEFT JOIN tb_console_user_resource ur ON ur.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tb_console_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY r.id ORDER BY r.sort
